ygData.subject: Re: Doh
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried this but to no avail, the problem was that the merchant was the 1st ogre in Oggok as you zone in. He must of had soooo many things sold to him. I spent
ygData.messageBody:
I tried this but to no avail, the problem was that the merchant was the 1st
ogre in Oggok as you zone in. He must of had soooo many things sold to him.
I spent 200pp trying to get it back but no luck. In the end I would have to
buy back FS weapons at 70pp each so I decided not to do that for the sake
of the lute.

Madagan


>BTW, if you sell some thing to a merch, you can sometimes buy it back.
You
>may need to buy a lot of stuff from them but they do have a pool of items
>that they got from players. If you keep buying from that pool, eventually
>you can buy your item back. Might be a whole lot easier to get a lev 50
>druid to help you get a new one.
